attributes.additional_details:
Bengal Brasserie recently opened a restaurant in Wetherby (West Yorkshire). Since it has opened local businesses and residents have suffered. Bengali Brasserie is now planning to open a take away on 2 Victoria Court Wetherby LS22 6JB   despite local authorities’ public document stating they cannot open a takeaway!!

There is a lot of conflicting information which Bengali Brasserie are not adhering to and do not have permission by local authorities.

I was browsing on the Leeds City Council to see what was happening in the local area, I was shocked to find how dare the group come into our community and not have respect for rules or regulations?? I certainly signed it and I recommend you take a look on this link https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?activeTab=documents&keyVal=LW3AJUJB0FZ00.

Please help the Wetherby we know and love. Say No to Bengali Brasserie!! By signing this petition.
Thank you
